name: saint
text: if he ever malfunctions and tries to destroy earth, simply clap loudly twice and he turns off.

name: chaesar
text: "And once every two years or so, you'll need to de-frag his lungs."

name: centipede_damascus
text: Has Beef crashed yet? This ought to come up sometime.

name: thatskotkid
text: Wait for it, gents, we still have a whole weddingful of disasters ahead of us.

name: i_love_kate
text: A comment left by i_love_kate was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by professorhazard, TonyHighwind, slalvation)

name: pogo
text: SPOILER COMING NEXT!

name: jonmw
text: Remember how far ahead of time Ray's decrepeit phone was set up? Well, I imagine that this is the setup of all setups.

name: atlanticcity
text: Theodor's death being called years in advance was a pretty great setup.

name: shmuckeles
text: yeah I am SO waiting for this to happen

name: straw
text: Man Beef and Click Bot are basically like cousins now

name: pberard
text: click robot ain't my cousin dogg its not like we are calling each other up at such as christmas

name: cdl146
text: But what's really important: is Beef's cardiopulmonary system bluetooth?

name: hendetta
text: Roast Beef is a cyborg.

name: johnnyrocker
text: Roast Beef is a transhuman. Or... Trans-feline.

name: foetus_punch
text:
Does this mean Beef might bring about a technological Singularity in a possible apocalypse scenario?

Well, if infinitely increasing intelligence is gonna start somewhere, might as well be a god damn depressed cat.

name: anathan
text: I hope Beef doesn't crash at his own wedding.

name: snowman
text: WEDING CRAHSERS LOL!!!!1

name: professoryes
text: The irony that the suicidal one is projected to live the longest by far is tangible.

name: rizzle
text: Unfortunately the doc ain't exactly right

name: quinlaenar
text: Hmm... I don't know how I feel about this comment. I would usually chubby for observational skills, but pointing out how short Beef will live always makes me sad.

name: wulvaine
text:
Yeah... I like to think that that particular comic is outside of Achewood canon, or that Onstad will conveniently ignore continuity, or SOMETHING, ANYTHING, that will let Beef live.

I love that cat, man... I identify with him as if he were such as my pixel-based brother.

name: atmus
text: Why? Just because he dies doesn't mean he stays dead.  How many Achewood people have died and stayed dead?  None that we know of, and even the ones we suspect are gone for good could be viewed as just having not come back yet.

name: wulvaine
text: Hmmm... I suppose you're right about that. The unpleasant finality of it sort of made me overlook that.

name: anzio
text: What's it matter? He wasn't projected to have died until like 2052. That means even if he did die then, we would have still gotten to hang with him for something like 42 years.

name: missbee
text:
Yeah we'd probably get sick of him after this amount of time anyways, right guys?

Just kidding.

name: anzio
text: It'd actually be kind of interesting to see Beef become a singer and watch the trip that comes from it.

name: zapatos
text: Who can say it is his death?  The white X with a black background may only be... divorce?

name: echidnaboy
text: Damn, I'd completely forgotten how Beef was revived. I already made my Apple joke on the [http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uua97HWqc#comment_10]Click Robot[/url] strip.

name: echidnaboy
text: God damn it anyway

name: professorhazard
text: Is he suffering? Does Dr. Andretti need to finish the job?

name: mg7810
text: The title of this strip indicates that Ray's AIBO sacrifice was about a six hundo. That is class money .

name: agentj
text: You know, I also hope Beef doesn't crash at his own wedding. If that day ever comes.

name: hayzeus
text: A comment left by hayzeus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by CatJumpJohn, fakead, atticusonline)

name: atticusonline
text: yeah....this was already posted...kinda lame there.

name: zapatos
text: two months before even.

name: wonelove
text: There is never any future mention about his cardiopulmonary system

name: mikeronomicon
text: I want that small hole in my chest. Do you think it works for hangovers? Mabe Ray should get one too...

name: agentstinky
text: Man what the dogg the strip where he tells Ray he needs the AIBO lung and Ray has to pick an AIBO to kill is missing from the archives.

name: edd36
text: Nope, it's just further back than you expected probably. http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uuabpbWkQ
